message.say: , if you are having trouble with the passage, feel free to read along with the audio.

message.name: A56
message.say: If you are having trouble reading the passage, then you can read along with the audio, by pressing the read audio button

message.name: A57
message.say: That is great! I'm excited for Jordan! Being invited to parties of your classmates can be so much fun! Remember that you can reply to a message by clicking on the reply button. This will allow you to respond directly to the sender of the message. The reply all button will send a message to Erica and everyone else in the class. Sometimes you may not want to respond to everyone in class, it depends on what you want to say

message.name: A58
message.say: Great! I'm happy you sent the message to Erica. Whenever you send a message, you will be directed back to your inbox! Or you can be directed back to another message, similar to what was just done. It looks like Jordan has a meeting at 3 o clock today! Let's reed it to see what it's about

message.name: A59
message.say: Hi Jordan and

message.name: A60
message.say: ! Welcome back to Seesaw!

message.name: A61
message.say: Well Jordan, we can help you with that! I think

message.name: A62
message.say: can help you answer whatever questions you may have!

message.name: A63
message.say: Great let's get started!

message.name: A64
message.say: Let's take a look at Jordan's account now! Click login whenever you're ready!

message.name: A65
message.say: Great message to Ms. Johnson and Dr. Arthur! It looks like we answered all of the urgent messages in Jordan's inbox. Let's go ahead and sign out! I think we're done for the day.

message.name: A66
message.say: Thank you

message.name: A67
message.say: for helping Jordan type and send emails and navigate through his new account! Jordan has now been signed out of his email account. In order to log back in he must reenter his password in the password box below.

message.name: A68
message.say: Great Jordan! You two have a wonderful day!

message.name: A69
message.say: Great! Now that we have the normal email out of the spam folder we can delete the spam emails! You will notice that your spam folder will constantly be full of messages. It is important that you always empty it out.

message.name: A70
message.say: Let's get started with the message to Jeanine and Dr. Arthur now!

message.name: A71
message.say: great work! You clicked on the login button, many email accounts will have different login styles but they all require you to do the same thing, which is put in your _user_name and password but remember to never share those with anyone

message.name: A72
message.say: Great!

message.name: A73
message.say: and Jordan there will be all types of emails inside of your inbox. some will be real and some will be spam! People will try to steal your information and take over your account. It is important to be able to tell the difference! It looks like there are 2 spam emails inside of Jordan's inbox already! wow!

message.name: A74
message.say: we're about to find out Jordan! Let's take a look!

message.name: A75
message.say: displayed is what a good subject line would look like! Let's try typing an email for Jordan now!

message.name: A76
message.say: Whoops!It looks like an email was sent to the spam folder by mistake! Sometimes this happens when your email account does not recognize the email address of the sender!

message.name: A77
message.say: Yes, great work!

message.name: A78
message.say: I think it is important to send a friendly message back to thank Jeanine Johnson for sending you a reminder email about your meeting with Dr. Arthur. And confirmation to Dr. Arthur telling him Jordan will be at the meeting.

message.name: A79
message.say: I think it's important for Jordan to know the difference between the folders he has in his email account. Can you click on the inbox folder for me?

message.name: A80
message.say: This is the inbox, It is highlighted green. The inbox holds all of Jordan's current emails.

message.name: A81
message.say: please select the inbox?

message.name: A82
message.say: Note that spam mail looks different from normal emails, they have funny characters and weird sayings, like "click here to claim your new car!"

message.name: A83
message.say: Please select all of the spam mail in the inbox.

message.name: A84
message.say: The email entitled Erica and Rachel's party was sent to the spam folder! Jordan's email account did not recognize the email address from the sender and placed it inside of this folder. This sometimes happens.

message.name: A85
message.say: Please move the email back to the right folder

message.name: A86
message.say: You selected the inbox folder. That was the correct folder.

message.name: A87
message.say: You selected the outbox folder, the correct folder is the inbox folder.

message.name: A88
message.say: You selected the spam folder, the right folder is the inbox folder

message.name: A89
message.say: You selected the trash folder, the folder that should have been picked is the inbox folder

message.name: A90
message.say: To delete messages you always click on the trash bin! The trash bin will delete the emails you selected. When you select emails to delete be sure that you really want to get rid of them because once you click on the trash bin the emails are deleted forever!

message.name: A91
message.say: Please click on a button to delete the spam emails.

message.name: A92
message.say: Jordan's email that landed in the spam folder was not spam at all! Click on the inbox folder and then click on the email from Jordan's friends so he can read it.

message.name: A93
message.say: That is the message from Jordan's friend! Now let's read it!

message.name: A94
message.say: Please click on the email from Jordan's friend.

message.name: A95
message.say: You should click on the reply button! This will allow you to reply only to Erica in the message.

message.name: A96
message.say: Please select an answer.

message.name: A97
message.say: before you send the message for Jordan! Can you type in an appropriate subject line? A subject line should tell the receiver the main reason why you're sending the email. Since this is an email from Jordan telling Erica that he wants to help the subject line should say this.

message.name: A98
message.say: That is a very fitting subject line for our email to Jordan's classmate. Here is another example of a good subject line

message.name: A99
message.say: thanks! displayed here is an example of an appropriate subjectline

message.name: A100
message.say: That is a really good subject line! Thank you for typing!

message.name: A101
message.say: when writing a subjectline, make sure it entails the message you want the receiver to know before they open it. So for example, if I want to send a message to my boss about running late to a meeting I’d make the subjectline “Running late to meeting.” Use this idea to create a subjectline for Erica and Rachel’s party.

message.name: A102
message.say: That is a great answer! I think you are on the right track.

message.name: A103
message.say: can you send an email back to Erica telling her that Jordan would like to help her set up for the party this weekend? Please be sure to write a greeting such as hi Erica and Rachel and a signature such as from Jordan,or thanks Jordan. It is always important to address the receiver when you first start a message and when you end a message by using a signature. When you are finished please click the send email button.

message.name: A104
message.say: here is an example of a good email to send

message.name: A105
message.say: That was a great message! Displayed here is another example of what a good email could be. It contains all of the appropriate information needed.

message.name: A106
message.say: That is really good email! Thank you for typing!

message.name: A107
message.say: That is not quite the answer I was looking for.

message.name: A108
message.say: when writing an email, create a message that allows the receiver to know the exact purpose of your email. So in this case, telling the receivers that you can help for decorate for their party is a great message to relay.

message.name: A109
message.say: That is a great answer! I think you are on the right track.

message.say: Oh that isn't quite what I was looking for.

message.say: Selecting reply all is the best option. There are two people on this current email, Jeanine Johnson and Dr. Arthur.

message.say: Please select an answer.

message.name: A113
message.say: before you type your message remember to type in an appropriate subjectline. So go ahead and type in a subjectline that says Thank you for the reminder.

message.name: A114
message.say: I really think that is a great subjectline! Displayed is another example of a good subjectline.

message.name: A115
message.say: can you please type a different subjectline in the subjectline bar.

message.name: A116
message.say: That is really good email! Thank you for typing!

message.name: A117
message.say: when writing a subjectline, make sure it encompasses the overall message you’d like to receiver to know. This way, they will have a general idea of the purpose of your message.

message.name: A118
message.say: That is a great answer! I think you are on the right track.

message.name: A119
message.say: Can you please tell Ms. Jeanine that Jordan said thank you for reminding him about his meeting with Dr. Arthur! And can you tell Dr. Arthur that Jordan will be at his office at 3.

message.name: A120
message.say: That is a nice email

message.say: ! thank you for typing it. Displayed is yet another example of good email.

message.say: try typing a different email that is more fitting.

message.name: A123
message.say: That is a really good email! Thank you for typing!

message.name: A124
message.say: when writing an email to two people, it is important to address them both. Also, be sure to make the purpose of your email clear. Thank Jeanine Johnson for her reminder and let Dr. Arthur know that you will see him during your meeting. So a short and sweet email that says thank you will do just fine.

message.name: A125
message.say: That is a great answer! I think you are on the right track.
